column5: Total weight of input material applied (kg)
column7: P concentration of concentrated P-fertiliser (% dry matter)
column8: Bio-available P fraction of concentrated P-fertiliser (% of total P)
column9: P-recovery in concentrated P-fertiliser (% of P in input material)*

column2: 1 kg bio-available P in a concentrated P-fertiliser

column1: *physical P-losses and spills are assumed to be zero across all pathways
